mapper.select: select id as countryId, * from country

SELECT COALESCE(SUM(tp.like), 0) AS totalLikes, c.id as countryId, c.country, c.city, c.image FROM country c LEFT JOIN travel_product tp ON c.id = tp.country_id GROUP BY c.id ORDER BY totalLikes DESC LIMIT 4;

SELECT MAX(tp.id) AS id, c.id AS countryId, c.*, SUM(tp.like) AS totalLikes FROM country c LEFT JOIN travel_product tp ON c.id = tp.country_id WHERE (c.country LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR c.city LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%') GROUP BY c.id ORDER BY CASE WHEN SUM(tp.like) IS NULL THEN 1 else 0 END, SUM(tp.like) DESC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET (#{start})
